content: this pattern describes how to crochet a leaf sheep sea slug out of crochet thread and craft thread to make the leaves stand up you will crochet a small length of craft wire to one side of each leaf **please omit wire if making a toy for a child ** leaves may not stand up without wire but wire would not be safe for children i made 8 long leaves and 4 short leaves they get increasingly difficult to sew on the more you attach feel free to add as many as desired the finished leaf sheep is approximately 1 33 long x 2 5 tall
